Header.title: Future of
Header.paragraph: Experience the future of security with our cutting-edge solutions in facial recognition, vehicle detection, and comprehensive surveillance. Stay protected, stay ahead.

About.paragraph: ESSI is a leading player in the Security, Transportation, Tolling, Parking, Smart Card Solution, Biometrics and RF Identification. Our focus is to develop customized solutions derived from the needs of the customer & the knowledge of cutting edge technology in association with the world leaders. We deliver effective solutions to a wide variety of terrorism-driven security challenges. We go to great lengths to guarantee a superior level of professionalism, discretion and confidentiality. The success of ESSI Integrated Technologies is based on award winning products, forging client relationships, understanding client’s requirements, meeting client’s needs consistently.The close personal involvement of our principles in the daily operation of each account, our commitment to the highest quality service, and our aggressive cost control procedures enable us to provide the best value in the industry. ESSI strives for to be your first choice to address your security needs swiftly and proficiently.

Products.name: Active Bollard
Products.subTitle: ESSI Hydraulic Bollards are crash-rated for A-40KN, B-180KN, and C-350KN. Equipped with an integrated electro-hydraulic drive unit, they can operate single or multiple bollards. One drive unit can manage up to three bollards per lane across six lanes.
Products.text: ESSI Hydraulic Bollards are crash-rated for A-40KN, B-180KN, and C-350KN. Equipped with an integrated electro-hydraulic drive unit, they can operate single or multiple bollards. One drive unit can manage up to three bollards per lane across six lanes.
keyFeatures: Compact hydraulic unit with motor, pump, solenoid valve and high pressure hydraulic cylinder.
Red flashing light in blocking element.
Emergency operation during power failure using hand pump.
Control in separate control box.
Blocking height: A-650mm/ B-800mm
Available impact/Cash strengths:  DSP1-450kN, DSP2-600kN, DSP3-900kN, DSP4-1250kN and DSP5-2500kN

Can be standard/ automatic control/ fully automatic operational with central command and control for multiple units- with video feeds/ 2-way voice communication and central operation control with data logging.
Long term corrosion protection through galvanizing and 3 layers of bonded plastic 4S.
DRDO- CCE (R&D) and Certified for confirming compliance with stated impact strength/ crash rating and equivalence to  ASTM f 2656 -07 / UK PAS / DOS K ratings.
technologiesUsed: ESSI Hydraulic Bollards are crash-rated for A-40KN, B-180KN, and C-350KN. Equipped with an integrated electro-hydraulic drive unit, they can operate single or multiple bollards. One drive unit can manage up to three bollards per lane across six lanes..

Products.name: Road Blockers
Products.subTitle: ESSI Road Blockers provide maximum security against unauthorized vehicles at entry-exit points. Crash-tested with a 7.5-ton truck at 80 km/h, they ensure reliability and continue to function fully after impact, offering robust security for high-sensitivity areas.
Products.text: ESSI Road Blockers provide maximum security against unauthorized vehicles at entry-exit points. Crash-tested with a 7.5-ton truck at 80 km/h, they ensure reliability and continue to function fully after impact, offering robust security for high-sensitivity areas.
keyFeatures: Compact hydraulic unit with motor, pump, solenoid valve and high pressure hydraulic cylinder.
Red flashing light in blocking element.
Emergency operation during power failure using hand pump.
Control in separate control box.
Blocking height: A-650mm/ B-800mm
Available impact/Cash strengths: DSP1-450kN, DSP2-600kN, DSP3-900kN, DSP4-1250kN and DSP5-2500kN

Can be standard/ automatic control/ fully automatic operational with central command and control for multiple units- with video feeds/ 2-way voice communication and central operation control with data logging.
Long term corrosion protection through galvanizing and 3 layers of bonded plastic 4S.
DRDO- CCE (R&D) and Certified for confirming compliance with stated impact strength/ crash rating and equivalence to ASTM f 2656 -07 / UK PAS / DOS K ratings.
technologiesUsed: The Road Blocker is operated by high speed hydraulic cylinders. A power pack containing an electric motor – pump assembly and an accumulator/handle for manual operation (in case of power failure) is installed up to a distance of 20 meters from the barrier in all weatherproof lockable steel casing on a concrete Base. The operation time for moving the blocker up & down can be from 2 to 6 seconds. When activated, the extremely heavy blocking segment will extend and block the entry. The average blocking height is 650 mm. With a dynamic road blocker, the barrier is 'lifted' and can therefore reach a blocking height of 850 mm. Due to the  eye-catching warning color and the warning lights the blocking segment is clearly visible to approaching vehicles which allows the vehicles to stop in good time. In the lowered position the Road Blocker is absolutely unobtrusive and flush with the road surface.

Products.name: Tyre Killers
Products.subTitle: ESSI Tyre Killers ensure high security against unauthorized vehicles. Designed to destroy tires and axles of intruding vehicles, they prevent forced entry or exit. They can be installed individually or with other ESSI products for an impenetrable vehicle checkpoint.
Products.text: ESSI Tyre Killers ensure high security against unauthorized vehicles. Designed to destroy tires and axles of intruding vehicles, they prevent forced entry or exit. They can be installed individually or with other ESSI products for an impenetrable vehicle checkpoint.
keyFeatures: Blocking spikes in 60 blocking positions, approx. 450 mm over ground level.
Distance between blocking spikes 200 mm.
Extension time 2-3 sec.
Wheel load 100 kN.
Installation depth 500 mm.
Control in separate control box for mounting on wall in a building.
Available Drive Units : S- Single(1) Unit, D – Double (2) Unit, T- Triple(3) Unit, Q- Quattro (4).
Long term corrosion protection through galvanizing and 3 layers on bonded plastic 4S.
DRDO- CCE (R&D) and Certified for confirming compliance with stated impact strength / crash rating and equivalence to ASTM f 2656 -07 / UK PAS / DOS K ratings.
ISO 9001 :2008 by DNV.

Can be standard/ automatic control/ fully automatic operational with central command and control for multiple units- with video feeds/ 2-way voice communication and central operation control with data logging.
technologiesUsed: The Tyre Killers is operated by high speed hydraulic cylinders. A power pack containing an electric motor – pump assembly and an accumulator/handle for manual operation(in case of power failure) is installed up to a distance of 20 meters from the tyre killer in all weatherproof lockable steel casing on a concrete base. The solid spikes can be raised either automatically or manually. It takes approx. 2 seconds and access will be blocked with a barrier height of 80-450mm.When the tyre killer is in the lowered position, it is completely unobtrusive and is flushed with the road surface.

Products.name: Boom Barriers
Products.subTitle: ESSI Automatic Boom Barriers secure entry and exit points at toll areas, offices etc. Featuring anti-crash devices, they integrate with access control, surveillance, and traffic monitoring systems, ensuring high security and reliable operation for various applications.
Products.text: ESSI Automatic Boom Barriers secure entry and exit points at toll areas, offices etc. Featuring anti-crash devices, they integrate with access control, surveillance, and traffic monitoring systems, ensuring high security and reliable operation for various applications.
keyFeatures: Security at the entry as well as exit points.
The limit switches for slowdown during both opening and closing can be adjusted both mechanically and electronically.
Reliable electro-mechanical drive.
Robust power transmission.
Damping into open and closed position.
Adjustable clutch.
Pole of strong light alloy.
Complete unit ready for connection.
Pole stand of steel.
Long term corrosion protection.
technologiesUsed: Entire system is powered by 24 Volts DC to avoid electrocution and to integrate barrier with other peripheral safety devices such as access control system, optical beam sensor, etc. for greater flexibility and  assure safety. The barrier is activated either by a single touch push button or remote control. However its electronic control panel is designed to accept signals from various controls and safety accessories such as beam sensor (optional), magnetic card reader (optional), computer, etc.

Products.name: Flap-Barriers
Products.subTitle: ESSI Retractable Flap Barriers, made from durable materials, open in less than 0.8 seconds. Integrated with access control systems, they ensure automatic clearance and accurate record-keeping. User-friendly and easy to operate, they offer efficient and secure access management.
Products.text: ESSI Retractable Flap Barriers, made from durable materials, open in less than 0.8 seconds. Integrated with access control systems, they ensure automatic clearance and accurate record-keeping. User-friendly and easy to operate, they offer efficient and secure access management.
keyFeatures: Rapid identification technique available to identify accurately and efficiently the magnetic card, barcode card etc.
Personalization for all type of ticket readers or contactless antenna.
With direction indication, guiding passenger to entry and exit.
Real time failure self-detect and alarm indication, ensuring system safe operation and facilitating maintenance and operation.
High flow rates of people depending on reader validation reaction speed.
Passage width: 20" to 24" for TGF with single flap panels and 32" to 36" for TGF with telescopic flap panel.
A dissuasive access control in one or both directions.
technologiesUsed: The construction consists of different segments bolt together. The middle segment contains the controller and drive unit. The middle segment has two hinged locked doors providing optimum access to the controller and drive mechanism. Various optional access control devices (such as card readers, finger print readers etc.) can be accommodated on a stainless steel fascia panel located at each end segment of the MPR. The pedestrian retractable barrier, designed for indoor installations, is made up of polished steel plate 430 stainless steel with protection class IP 32.

Products.name: Face Detection and Recognition
Products.subTitle: Our face detection and recognition system accurately identifies individuals in real-time, enhancing security and access control. Utilizing advanced algorithms and AI, it provides quick and reliable identification, making it ideal for high-security environments, workplaces, and public spaces.

Ideal for businesses, warehouses, and facilities requiring controlled access and monitoring.

This system detects hidden threats and anomalies, ensuring thorough inspections and heightened security at critical entry points, ideal for high-security facilities and checkpoints.

Services.title: Turnkey Project Implementation
Services.text: ESSI's Turnkey Project Implementation Services offer end-to-end solutions, managing all project phases from planning to execution. With expertise in design, integration, and deployment, we ensure seamless implementation, timely delivery, and optimal performance, catering to diverse industry needs.
Services.overview: ESSI Integrated Technologies Pvt. Ltd. offers consultancy in various security domains including IT security, physical security, and fraud prevention through advanced technologies, serving both private and public sectors efficiently.

Services.title: Design, Development, Training
Services.text: ESSI's comprehensive services encompass design, development, and training. We create innovative designs, develop robust and user-friendly systems, and provide extensive training programs to ensure seamless operation and user proficiency. Our holistic approach ensures optimal performance and client satisfaction across various projects.

We create innovative designs, develop robust and user-friendly systems, and provide extensive training programs to ensure seamless operation and user proficiency. Our holistic approach ensures optimal performance and client satisfaction across various projects.
